sentences.sContent: I like these and he likes those.
sentences.sContent_eng: I like these and he likes those.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢这些，他喜欢那些。

sentences.sContent: I have no answer of these at all.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have no answer of these at all.
sentences.sCn: 对于这些，我也不知道答案。

sentences.sContent: I like these but she likes those.
sentences.sContent_eng: I like these but she likes those.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢这些，而她喜欢那些。
